EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Multi-Site Pivotal Cloud Foundry: Deployment Topology Patterns & Practices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Multi-Site Pivotal Cloud Foundry: Deployment Topology Patterns & Practices white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- White Paper: Crossing the Value Stream: Improving Development with Pivotal and Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/crossing-the-value-stream-improving-development-with-pivotal-and-cloud-foundry]]> - Video: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Overview — Onsi Fakhouri <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7APZD0me1nU]]>
- Blog: New in Spring Cloud Services 1.2: Multi-Site Service Discovery <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/new-in-spring-cloud-services-1-2-multi-site-service-discovery]]>
- eBook: Cloud-Native: Designing Change Tolerant Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-designing-change-tolerant-software]]>
- Web: Cloud Native - Topic Page <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=uberflip&utm_medium=cta&utm_campaign=topic-pages]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
